credit_line: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
title: Two Women Border Guards
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
description: Two female figures: one stands with left arm raised, hand over eyes, right hand holding standing rifle, she wears red head kerchief and red skirt; the other kneels, holds rifle, wears red skirt, printed blouse; on rounded base.
name: Figure
